name: write some code that is able to return the index of the array where the sum of integers at the index on the left is equal to the sum of integers on the right

steps.name: Given User is able to access ECS application
When User should able to click on Render the challenge button
And User should able to find correct index value and able to enter the index value for challenge 1 and challenge 2 and challenge 3 and name
Then User should able to submit the answers successfully

fullName: Your job is to use a browser based testing tool to read the dom and create an array data structure for each of the rows: write some code that is able to return the index of the array where the sum of integers at the index on the left is equal to the sum of integers on the right
